text: Ahmet Hromadžić (11 October 1923 – 1 January 2003) was a Bosnian writer. ==Bibliography== *Labudova poljana, novel, Sarajevo, 1952. *Patuljak iz Zaboravljene zemlje, novel, Sarajevo, 1956. *Patuljak vam priča, short stories, Sarajevo, 1957. *Okamenjeni vukovi, novel, Sarajevo, 1963. *Dječji pisci o sebi,( I, II, III ) prose, Sarajevo 1963. *Bijeli cvijet, short stories, Sarajevo, 1965. *Zlatorun, short stories, Sarajevo, 1966. *Zelengor, short stories, Sarajevo, 1971. *Bistri potoci, novel, Sarajevo, 1971. *Bijeli slavuj, short stories, Sarajevo, 1972. *Dječak jaše konja, novel, Sarajevo 1977. *Ledena gora, picture book, Sarajevo 1977. *Patuljak iz zaboravljene zemlje, drama, Sarajevo, 1980. title: Ahmet Hromadžić
